name: Odd Jobs (Patrice Metcalf-Putnam, influffity)
description:
Short (15-30m) game where you collect all the endings! Made for Portland Indie Game Squad Character Creator Jam.

  • Customize your character
  • Apply and interview at the illustrious Corp Corp
  • Unlock outfits
  • Collect all 8 endings!
Credits

By Unseen Squirrel (Alvin Raj and Patrice Metcalf-Putnam)

Audio and misc credits for resources listed in-game on the About page.
